Y(12987) = intersection, other than A, B, C, of circumconics {{A, B, C, X(56), Z(7009)}}, {{A, B, C, X(7373), Z(5365)}}, {{A, B, C, Z(6773), Z(10253)}}

Y(12987) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {12571, Y12650}

Y(12987) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): {1, 17502, 13624}, {3, 17502, 31663}, {3, 35202, 33862}, {165, 31666, 33179}, {1385, 16200, 15178}, {1385, 3579, 8148}, {8148, 35242, 3579}, {13624, 31663, 1}, {31663, Y12984, 3}, {34556, 34557, 10247}, {50833, Y12617, 34638}
